meanings.definition: The act of removing or forcing out of a position or place.
meanings.sent1: The dislodgment of the rock from the cliff was loud.
meanings.sent2: The dislodgment of the old tree stump took a lot of effort.
meanings.sent3: The dislodgment of the cat from the cozy spot on the couch was met with protest.
meanings.sent4: The dislodgment of the idea from his mind left him feeling empty.
meanings.sent5: The dislodgment of the puzzle piece made it impossible to complete the picture.

meanings.definition: The state of being removed or forced out of a position or place.
meanings.sent1: After the earthquake, the dislodgment of the boulders blocked the road.
meanings.sent2: The dislodgment of the book from the shelf revealed a hidden compartment.
meanings.sent3: The dislodgment of the snow from the roof created a mini avalanche.
meanings.sent4: The dislodgment of the leader caused chaos among the group.
meanings.sent5: The dislodgment of the key from the lock left the door stuck.
